entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:28 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 6:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 54 %
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: W 33 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow at times heavy beginning late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets changing to ice pellets or periods of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
